Ref: CXP099/2024

Criteria:
Grade 12 + Qualification in Millwright, Electrical Engineer or Mechanical Engineer
Strong mechanical experience
Electric Control and Instrumentation experience
3 – 5 years’ relevant experience in maintenance.
Knowledge of Landfill maintenance is an advantage
Computer literate (Google Workspace, MS Office)
Knowledge of PLC and SCADA Programming and maintenance.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Be available for shut-downs and 24-hour stand-by duties.

Apply via website or alternatively via the link: https://forms.gle/8mRbBqpY1WY7fSPs7
